keyPoints: Utilized TensorFlow and PyTorch for developing and training models.
Focused on identifying unusual patterns in hyperspectral data, used CNN + Encoder-Decoder architecture
Leveraged QGIS for geospatial analysis and visualization of hyperspectral data.
Created a question-answering bot that functioned offline, addressing security and operational requirements.
Used LlamaIndex and Ollama (based on LLaMA models) to power the Q&A system.
Integrated ChromaDB for efficient retrieval of vector-based data and Neo4j for managing the knowledge graph.
Built the bot's interface using Flask for backend and Streamlit for a user-friendly frontend.
